body.name: Super7 Dungeons & Dragons Sorceress - 3.75" Dungeons and Dragons Action Figure with Accessory Vintage Collectibles and Retro Toys
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.

Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 2 mins
features: D&D SUPER7 ACTION FIGURE: The mystical Sorceress class from the Dungeons & Dragons boxed Basic Set joins the Super7 action toy figures lineup
ADVENTURE-READY ACCESSORIES: This action figure comes with a Wand of Fire accessory, allowing you to relive your favorite moments from the classic Dungeons and Dragons game
3.75-INCH ACTION FIGURE: Sorceress figure is 3.75" tall with the rest of the Dungeons and Dragons game ReAction figures lineup

PREMIUM ACTION FIGURES: Relive the good times all over again with our ReAction figures, classic 3.75" scale action figure toys that fit in the palm of your hand; Featuring Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, G.I. Joe, Toho, Who Framed Roger Rabbit, and more

COLLECTIBLE TOYS & FIGURES: From TMNT action figures and G.I. Joe skateboard decks to Power Rangers t-shirts and SpongeBob toys, Super7 makes the perfect retro collectibles, vintage toys, and nostalgia gifts for pop culture fanatics and collectors
body.description: With the Dungeons & Dragons ReAction figures, your imagination is the only limit to your adventure! Magic may not solve every problem, but when facing down a dragon, demon, or other mighty foe, a Sorceress' ability to wield the mystical arts can be the difference between life and death! This 3.75” scale articulated Dungeons and Dragons action figure of Sorceress is inspired by the cover of the vintage boxed Basic Set and comes with a Wand of Fire accessory. Level up your collection of fantasy and adventure characters with the D&D Sorceress, Githyanki, and Efreeti ReAction figures - the perfect Dungeons and Dragons Gifts for any D&D fanatic! Super7 makes retro collectibles, vintage toys, and nostalgia gifts for pop culture fanatics and collectors. We grew up with giant monsters, comic books, punk, science fiction, skateboarding, robots, and rebellion. No one made what we wanted. So we made it ourselves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Adventure is Yours! In Dungeons & Dragons, “The Adventure is Yours!” Super7 is celebrating adventure with the release of new Dungeons & Dragons ReAction Figures inspired by vintage cover art from the original fantasy-quest roleplaying game! Choose a Sorceress, an Efreeti, or a Githyanki to begin your quest or collect all three and weave a rich tapestry of excitement and danger for these characters to traverse! With the Dungeons & Dragons ReAction Figures, your imagination is the only limit to your adventure!
Sorceress Efreeti Githyanki Accessory Wand of Fire Scimitar Greatsword Wave Wave 1 Wave 1 Wave 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool old school figure
reviews.reviewText: Great little figure. Never thought would see a figure based of a work by one of D&D’s original artists - Erol Otus. Hope we get to see a few more figures based off his works. I had to keep the card for this one too. Hope he starts putting up some giclee’s of his works too. Be really cool have one up in a game room…. Mulling getting the other two figures that came out same time as this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived promptly and in perfect condition
reviews.reviewText: I got the Githyanki first then the Efreeti. They go with my Dungeon Master Guide I've had since 1980 and my Fiend Folio I've had since 1982. These are GREAT additions to my D&D collection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love all of their toys and they're always coming out with new ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Sorceress Action Figure
reviews.reviewText: Overall, a nice action figure that's true to coloration/form from the D&D rule set box. Similar to the early Star Wars actions figures with points of articulation. Stands nicely without assistance and holds her arm position well. The flaming torch is a little loose in her hand. It would have been nice to include a green orb with mist as it is in the original artwork. The paint job is clean and good. Her cape is constructed of vinyl.The figure packaging is good with the original artwork on the card face. Now thinking of it, it would have been cool to have the treasure chest included with her too. Oh well!The only problem I have is that when packaged for mailing, a large piece of tape was stuck upon the face of the blister card ... ripping off a portion of the image. If I was a collector wanting it keep it ... I'd be very upset.I hope they continue with this line and create the fighter that's with her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been a D&D fan since 1978. I still have my original Fiend Folio from back then. I always thought they should have made a figurine, and finally someone has, and it's perfect.I mean perfect. This is going to be proudly displayed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing likenesses from the books
reviews.reviewText: Super7 has outdone themselves again with their ReAction line, creating action figures in the original Kenner Star Wars style for all kinds of other media characters from the days when we Gen-Xers were younger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a fantastic figure and card!
reviews.reviewText: I did not take the figure out to articulate, so I can't speak to it's mobility, but it looks fantastic and having the original art from the Fiend Folio on the card just brings out the nostalgia and makes this a wonderful display piece!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Githyanki money can buy!
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had the guts to open the package. But, I'm keeping this Githyanki encased for my own protection.
Another great Super7 ReAction figure. Received from Amazon in fine condition.
Slight blemishes found on back of card. No sure whether it's supposed to be looking this way.
